about_the_game:
Pight is a minimalist puzzle game inspired by the Minecraft redstone system, in which we try to turn on the light block by using piston blocks and different block types. It offers a rich puzzle experience thanks to new mechanics added approximately every 10 levels.

Gameplay:

    • Discover the game on your own, no tutorials!
    • Use pistons to push and pull blocks
    • Stick the blocks
    • Move blocks on rails
    • Stay away from dynamite!
    • Sometimes you'll have to think a bit

Features:

    • New mechanics added every 10 levels
    • 8 different mechanics in total
    • 90 levels (from simple to insufferably difficult)
    • Simple, relaxing, peaceful puzzle experience
    • Full HD in all resolutions
    • Smooth animations
    • Good game feel
    • Gamepad support
    • No text
    • Minimalist interface
    • Steam Achievements
    • Steam Cloud

Controls:

    • You can play the whole game using only your mouse. No need for complex controls!

Music and Sound Design by Görkem Yılmaz <3
